name: Elena Vashchenko
title: Visual Storyteller
bio: Elena Vashchenko is a contemporary photographer based in Tokyo, known for her cinematic approach to street and portrait photography. With a background in film direction, she treats every frame as a scene from a movie that was never made. Her work explores the silent dialogue between urban architecture and the human condition.
philosophy: I believe that photography is not about capturing reality, but about creating a new one. It's an act of subtractionâ€”removing the noise to reveal the essence of a moment. In a world screaming for attention, I look for the whispers.
